mapper.insert: insert into pdm_archive_check_info (product_id, status, temporary_path, file_name, is_multi_period) values (#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{temporaryPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMultiPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select product_id, status, temporary_path, file_name, is_multi_period from pdm_archive_check_info
